titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Lord Mayor and aldermen at Guildhall-Chappel, on Palm-Sunday, 1679 and now published as it was then delivered / by Samuel Johnson ...
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703.
Johnson, Samuel, 1649-1703. Second five year's struggle against popery and tyranny.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Also appears as part of Johnson's Second five year's struggle against popery and tyranny (Wing J843) at reel 386:10.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
